## Multiple lineare Regression

$$
y \sim x_1 + x_2 + ... + x_p
$$

$$
y \sim \beta_0 + \beta_1 x_1 + \beta_2 x_2 + ... + \beta_p x_p + \epsilon
$$

$$
\epsilon \sim \mathcal{N}(0, s^2_y)
$$
